tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE driver_preferences (
    driver_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    music_genre VARCHAR,
    playlist_name VARCHAR,
    volume_level INT,
    display_color VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE music_library (
    song_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    song_name TEXT,
    artist_name TEXT,
    genre TEXT,
    release_year INT
);

CREATE TABLE podcast_library (
    podcast_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    podcast_title TEXT,
    podcast_host TEXT,
    category TEXT,
    episode_duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE audiobooks (
    driver_id INT,
    title TEXT,
    author TEXT,
    narrator TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (driver_id) REFERENCES drivers(driver_id)
);
